‚ÄúIt was a tremendous honor to serve my beloved home state on the Task Force. Thanks for your support everyone, and #CowboyOn!‚Äù Lang said.
Wyoming is poised to do for blockchain and cryptocurrency companies what South Dakota did for credit card companies in the early 1980s, Chris Land said.
NYDFS created the BitLicense in 2014. Soon its superintendent would come face to face with the creator of legislation that could strip away some of its gravity - @AdminKlein
‚ÄúWe have a true history of independence and taking on the Feds,‚Äù Long said. https://t.co/fyw6c9TZ9M
‚ÄúCaitlin has for two years been the Wyoming Blockchain Task Force‚Äôs road-warrioress, its most visible face and vocal member,‚Äù @emschanning

‚ÄúCaitlin is a tremendous force to be reckoned with.. She has boundless energy and cares deeply about the development of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology," says Mary Beth Buchanan, general counsel of crypto exchange Kraken.

‚ÄúCaitlin has just an insatiable thirst for knowledge and debate and learning and ideas‚Ä¶ She's able to focus in like a laser beam, and then she doesn't let go until she's figured it out,‚Äù Land said.
‚ÄúHer ability to walk into a room and take it over ‚Äì but in a very respectful, congenial way ‚Äì is remarkable,‚Äù said Ethan Bronsnick.
‚ÄúPeople tell me that she's a big deal in the blockchain space and it's just kind of unreal to me ‚Äì you know some famous person, but she doesn't feel like a famous person, you know?‚Äù Land said.

‚ÄúLong is able to act as a bridge between the rural West and the metropolitan hubs that house most of the blockchain industry. She‚Äôs spoken about Wyoming‚Äôs strides in the space at probably more than 100 industry events and podcasts this year alone‚Äù - @AdminKlein

‚ÄúSome very powerful people came up to us today to talk about applying the charter in Wyoming,‚Äù @CaitlinLong_ says, ‚ÄúThis is a legal regime‚Ä¶we seem to hit right over the proverbial plate with the people who needed to know.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is untested,‚Äù says Land, ‚Äúbut we are feeling confident that the Wyoming Special Purpose Depository Institutions will be able to operate in New York without a BitLicense.‚Äù
‚ÄúShe and Chris Land have essentially come up with a loophole for crypto asset companies operating in New York without a BitLicense‚Äù - @AdminKlein

Leaving Wall Street for Wyoming, @CaitlinLong_ spearheaded 13 crypto laws that will make it easier to do business for crypto firms. In honor, here‚Äôs 13 quotes from @AdminKlein's profile that show why she‚Äôs #mostinfluential2019 https://t.co/FRkVBvG0rV https://t.co/AAvFce1Wu2
